lead_paragraph: Under the measure, an adult who cannot manage his or her own affairs and must depend on a legal guardian would have the right to receive visits from family members.

headline.main: Iowa Law Arising From Kasem Case Ensures Adult Children Can See Sick Parents
headline.print_headline: Iowa Law Arising From Kasem Case Ensures Adult Children Can See Sick Parents

snippet: Under the measure, an adult who cannot manage his or her own affairs and must depend on a legal guardian would have the right to receive visits from family members.
